passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: but you manage to keep your footing.

original: and you lose your footing.

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: The soft, cold snow absorbs the shock of your fall as you land on your butt. You climb to your feet, grateful that the snow cushioned your <<bellyDescription "pc">> from harm.

original: The bog is profoundly silent.

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: It's peaceful, and almost relaxing. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

original: Parts of the bog have frozen over in patches. What little light breaks through casts brilliant reflections.

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You come across a frozen pond, and look down at your reflection.

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: As you pass through the alley, the wind suddenly picks up and funnels a huge swathe of falling snow in your direction. You shield yourself as you're assailed by wet and cold snowflakes. When the wind finally dies down, you're left freezing with damp clothes.

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: The rain gives way to hail, and you take shelter under a nearby awning. A <<personsimple>> with a pram is already there, murmuring reassurances to <<his>> fussy newborn. <<He>> smiles and nods at your <<bellyDescription "pc">>. "When are you due?" <<he>> asks. The two of you make idle chit-chat as you wait for the hail to let up.

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: As it finally dies down, the <<father>> mentions that <<he>> lives on <<print either("Domus Street", "Danube Street")>> and suggests that you have a playdate once you give birth. When <<he>> asks where you live, you confess that you're a resident of the orphanage. The <<persons>> face twists in a mixture of pity and distaste, and <<he>> mumbles a hasty goodbye before stepping out into the rain once more. You watch as the pram disappears into the distance, feeling oddly bereft. <<trauma 6>><<gtrauma>>

The stem is also connected to one of the distinctive <<print either("samaras", "maple keys", "helicopters", "whirlybirds", "polynoses")>> containing the seeds.<<else>>You're not sure what it was, but it was huge and almost covered your whole face.<</if>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You walk through the forest and can't help but admire the various oranges, browns and yellows breaking through the canopy. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You stop in your tracks as you hear a feral growl. Looking down, you see a badger at the foot of a nearby tree. It's surrounded by scattered dirt. You seem have interrupted it digging its winter den. You back away slowly until it returns to its digging. <<stress 3>><<gstress>>

original: A <<personsimple>> runs <<his>> fingers through <<his>> hair. <<He>> picks dead leaves out, crunching them in <<his>> hands before dropping them.

original: <<case "bog">>

original: The bog is filled with a repeated thrumming sound. You spot the source. A woodpecker digs into a tree high above the water. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: As you walk, you can't help but notice how stagnant everything seems. While the forest fills with various colours, everything here stays the same, murky green or brown.

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You stop at a strange clearing. You notice what looks like some kind of effigy made of twigs. As you stare, you notice more and more wrong with the scene. Its eyes are filled with burnt out candles. The rock formations around it aren't natural, and are clearly some kind of cairn. Dark roots stretch up from the ground to grasp the effigy. You snap out of what feels like an unnatural haze, and make an effort to leave as quickly as you can. <<stress 12>><<ggstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: The brutal summer heat weighs down on you. <<stress 3>><<gstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: The cool night air makes for a nice reprieve from the blistering days. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: A cool breeze blows by and revitalises you. <<stress -1>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: A brutal wave of heat washes over you. You take a moment to wipe the sweat from your head. <<stress 1>><<gstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You overhear a <<person>> talking on <<his>> cell phone about <<his>> upcoming holiday trip. <<if $trauma lte ($traumamax / 5) * 3>> Hearing <<his>> obvious enthusiasm for the trip makes you smile. <<stress -1>><<lstress>><<else>>You resent hearing about a trip you'll never be able to take, stuck in this town like you are. <<stress 1>><<gstress>><</if>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You see a group of kids playing. Most are running and squealing as they spray each other with water guns, but a few are lazing on the grass. Occasionally, their friends cool them off with a blast of water, causing them to giggle.

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You rub your <<bellyDescription "pc">> and wonder if your <<pregnancyBabyText "pc">> will be as easygoing as they are. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: <<case "town">>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You see a <<person>> fanning <<himself>> with <<his>> top to cope with the heat. <<He>> suddenly flashes you by lifting it up completely. <<arousal 5>><<garousal>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: An ice cream truck drives by, with a group of orphans chasing after it. The tune it plays is upbeat and catchy. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: As you pass by a <<person>> watering <<his>> lawn, <<he>> accidentally sprays you with the hose. The cold water is refreshing, but dampens your clothes.

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: <<case "alley">>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: Two students with water guns race through the alley firing at each other. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: As you pass through the alley, you see a <<beasttype>> sprawled out inside a cardboard box in an attempt to escape the heat. You can't help but sympathise. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: A <<person>> sits on <<his>> back porch, smoking a cigarette and enjoying the coolness of the summer night air. <<He>> waves as <<he>> notices you. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: <<case "park">>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You notice several youths nearby tossing water balloons at one another. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: Despite the heat, you notice many people playing and relaxing here. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: As you walk through the park, you're narrowly missed by several water balloons. Hearing laughter, you turn to see several delinquents running away. <<stress 3>><<gstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: A <<personsimple "normal">> with <<plant_details "forest">> in <<his>> hair peeks out of a bush. <<He>> looks nervous. When <<he>> spots you, <<he>> dives back into the bush.

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: <<case "forest">>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: The heat of the forest is sweltering, the breeze blocked by the trees. <<stress 3>><<gstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: As you move through the forest, you notice a family unpacking camping supplies. They notice you and wave. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You begin to hear crickets chirping nearby, and soon enough a whole orchestra of insects fill the night air around you. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: A <<personsimple>> stands completely still, holding branches. <<Hes>> pretending to be a tree, but <<he>> can't keep <<his>> balance enough to fool anyone.

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: <<case "bog">>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: The humidity is oppressive. You feel a little lightheaded. <<stress 3>><<gstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: Other than the walkway, there are few signs of human incursion here. <<stress -3>><<gstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You begin to hear crickets chirping nearby, and soon enough a whole orchestra of insects fill the night air around you. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: <<case "moor">>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: The sweltering heat creates undefinable shapes on the horizon. <<stress 3>><<gstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You feel something scurry across your foot. Who knows what manner of creatures wander the moor with the heat of the sun gone? You quicken your pace. <<stress 3>><<gstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You stop suddenly as you see a light flicker into being ahead. An effigy constructed of twigs, candles burning in its eye sockets, stands amidst a circle of stone cairns. Disturbed, you begin to walk away.

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: Until you notice the effigy turns to watch you as you go past. You break into a sprint without another thought. <<stress 24>><<awareness 10>><<gggstress>><<gawareness>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: <<case "spring">>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: A gentle spring breeze caresses your face. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: A <<if Time.dayState is "day" or Time.dayState is "dawn">>butterfly<<else>>moth<</if>> lands on your nose and pauses to rub its antennae before taking flight again. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: Birds chirp overhead as they return from their winter migration. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You see a group of kids playing. One <<personsimple>> is sitting apart from the others, making a chain of daisies. The other children ask <<him>> to help them make cakes out of mud, but <<he>> silently shakes <<his>> head.

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You rub your <<bellyDescription "pc">> and wonder if your <<pregnancyBabyText "pc">> will be as timid as <<he>> is. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: <<case "town">>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: A street peddler selling flowers hands you a free flower as you pass by. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You see a <<person>> on <<his>> knees tending to <<his>> garden. As you walk past, <<he>> backs into you, grinding <<his>> rear into your leg before glancing over <<his>> shoulder. "Sorry," <<he>> calls out as you walk away flustered. <<stress 1>><<arousal 5>><<gstress>><<garousal>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: There's a small flower market set up here. You stop to smell the flowers before continuing. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: <<case "alley">>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You notice that someone has built a garden beneath one of the windows here, where flowers have begun to sprout despite the filth. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You hear <<beastsplural>> yowling and hissing as they contend for a mate. <<if $cat gte 6>><<arousal 10>><<garousal>><</if>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You see a pair of <<if $monster is 1>>dogpeople<<else>>dogs<</if>> eating a pile of spaghetti together next to a trash can. Romantic Italian music plays from a nearby building. You shake your head and leave. <<stress -24>><<lllstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: <<case "park">>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You notice the flowers in the park have started to bloom once more. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: A hummingbird zips by and lands on a flower to drink nectar before flying off. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You see a <<person>> snatch a freshly bloomed flower and give it to a <<person2>><<person>> before they embrace and kiss. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: <<case "forest">>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You hear a thunderous crack above. A large branch tumbles from a large tree, landing only inches away. <<stress 12>><<ggstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You see a pair of rabbits chasing and tumbling over each other. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: Birds sing to one another as they build nests and seek mates. <<if $syndromebird is 1>>You find yourself longing for your own mate, back in the moor.<</if>> <<stress -6>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: <<case "bog">>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You hear a splash nearby. Followed by another. A group of frogs jump around amidst the plantlife. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: All around you, the sounds of various small insects and critters fill the air. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: <<case "moor">>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You stop to take a look around. Even the moor looks vibrant this time of year. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You come across a pond where dark water conceals darker shapes swimming within. <<stress 6>><<gstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: You come to a strangely clear patch of ground that contains a circle of stone and a scorch mark in its centre. You suddenly feel watched, and leave without hesitation. <<stress 12>><<ggstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: A <<personsimple>> holds a vine still for a hummingbird to land on.

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: It flits onto <<his>> vine and lands, sitting down. The <<personsimple>> lets out a happy gasp. <<stress -3>><<lstress>>

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: It hovers near <<his>> vine for a second, before zipping away. The <<personsimple>> sighs.

passage: Ambient Weather And Seasonal Event Widgets
original: ERROR: You have somehow managed to pass beyond the concepts of time and weather. Please inform Vrelnir unless you just used a cheat.
